keyQuestions.title: Before you continue, you need to know:
keyQuestions.question1: Is it legal to use this service?
keyQuestions.answer1: Yes! Tracking is 100% legal when used for legitimate purposes such as protecting minors, family safety, or recovering your own devices.
keyQuestions.answer2: No! Our method is completely discreet and imperceptible. The person being monitored receives no notification or alert.

faq.answer2: No, you don't need access to the phone. Our system only needs the phone number to perform tracking.
